data.comment: The match has started.
In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 4, Yuto Uchida for Tosu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Urawa.
In the minute 5, Takahiro Sekine (Urawa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tomoya Koyamatsu of Tosu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Tosu.
In the minute 17, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Yuki Muto (Urawa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In the minute 20, Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Tosu in the half of Urawa.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
In the minute 25, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Urawa at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 29, Yuta Higuchi of Tosu gets in a strike, but is off target.
Hajime Matsuo awards Urawa a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Throw-in for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Urawa in the half of Tosu.
Tosu have a goal kick.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tosu.
At Ekimae Real Estate Stadium, Tosu are penalized for being offside.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Urawa drive upfield and Yosuke Kashiwagi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tosu defender.
In the minute 40, Renzo Lopez (Tosu) has received a yellow card from Hajime Matsuo.
Important block from the Tosu defence as Yosuke Kashiwagi fires in a strike for Urawa.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Urawa's Takahiro Sekine has been booked in Tosu.
Can Urawa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tosu's half?
In the minute 44, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Tosu throw-in in Urawa's half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Throw-in Tosu.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
In the minute 46, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Urawa are coming forward and Shinzo Koroki gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Hajime Matsuo awards Tosu a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Tosu make their first substitution with Daichi Hayashi replacing Renzo Lopez.
Kenyu Sugimoto is on a sub for Takahiro Sekine for Urawa.
In the minute 48, Urawa's Quenten Martinus misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
In the minute 50, Tosu are pushing forward but Yuta Higuchi's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Urawa at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
In the minute 52, Urawa have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 55, Tomoya Ugajin of Urawa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Tosu have a goal kick.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Tosu.
In the minute 58, Myung Hwi Kim is making the team's second substitution at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium with Yoshiki Takahashi replacing Ryang Yong-Gi.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
Penalty! Hajime Matsuo points to the spot, great chance for Tosu...
Tsuyoshi Otsuki (Urawa) is making a second substitution, with Kazuki Nagasawa replacing Shinzo Koroki.
In the minute 66, The away team have replaced Yuki Muto with Koya Yuruki. This is the third substitution made today by Tsuyoshi Otsuki.
Tosu were awarded a penalty ... Which Daichi Hayashi failed to convert!
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Urawa.
In the minute 72, At Ekimae Real Estate Stadium, Yoshiki Takahashi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Urawa's Kenyu Sugimoto breaks free at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Fuchi Honda is replacing Kaisei Ishii for the home team.
The home team replace Tomoya Koyamatsu with Takeshi Kanamori.
In the minute 75, Tosu's Ryoya Morishita gets in a shot on goal at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 79, Tosu have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Tosu are coming forward and Fuchi Honda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 81, Hajime Matsuo awards Urawa a goal kick.
Urawa's Tomoya Ugajin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Urawa.
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
Tiago Alves is replacing Yuto Uchida for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tosu just outside Urawa's area.
In the minute 87, In Tosu Tosu attack through Tiago Alves. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Ewerton (Urawa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Urawa.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tosu in the half of Urawa.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Urawa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tosu.
Urawa have a goal kick.
Urawa's Ewerton misses with an attempt on goal.
Hajime Matsuo awards Tosu a goal kick.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
Goal! Koya Yuruki gives Urawa a 0-1 lead in Tosu.
Tsuyoshi Otsuki is making the team's fourth substitution at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium with Ryosuke Yamanaka replacing Yosuke Kashiwagi.
Daisuke Suzuki is on a sub for Quenten Martinus for Urawa.
